Lecture_3_slides.pdf.content:
Security attack•Definition: any action that compromises the security of information owned by an organization•Two types of security attacks•Passive attack•Active attack
Passive attack•i.e.eavesdropping

Lecture_4_slides.pdf.content: Know Your Threat Model•Threat model:A model of who your attacker is and what resources they have•One of the best ways to counter an attacker is to attack their reasonsStory…•The bear race•Takeaway:Eve
